# HearNow - Speech to Text App

## Project Overview
Cross-platform speech-to-text application using Deepgram Nova 3, WebSocket, Flutter (frontend), and Node.js (backend).

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Node.js server with WebSocket and Deepgram integration
- `/frontend` - Flutter application for cross-platform UI
